summary: CAR WAS TAKING ON WATER FROM RAIN STORMS LEAKING THROUGH BODY ROOF AREA THROUGH THE CONTROL PANEL ON THE CEILING OF VEHICLE AND DRIPPING WATER RAPIDLY TO FLOOR TRAVELING DOWN THE WINDSHIELD MOLDING ON THE  INSIDE OF THE WINDOW TRIM ON INSIDE OF DOORS.  SENT IN TO BE FIXED UNDER 36,000. WARRANTY.  STILL LEAKING SAME THING...  TOLD TOO HARD TO FIND LEAK.  OPENED FILE WITH GMAC97471426.  OWNER WILL REOPEN FILE WHEN SERVICE CAN TAKE CAR IN FOR FURTHER REVIEW.   *NLM
